name: WagglePetMonitor-RemoteTemperatureMonitoring
0:
”Alexa, ask waggle pet monitor”
”Alexa, ask waggle pet monitor what is my current humidity”
”Alexa, ask waggle pet monitor what is my current temperature”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: waggle pet monitor
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Waggle enabled smart temperature and humidity sensor alerts via email and SMS when temperature or humidity goes low or high. It comes with a USB-powered rechargeable battery with four days back-up that offers you complete peace of mind.

To know the temperature status from Alexa, Say, "Alexa, what's the Waggle's temperature."
Note: To use, this skill user should have an account with Waggle and Waggle devices.
